segments.text: I notice the boy is really going for it, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip, and he’s going to fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one, and it’s almost sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get caught before they even get to eat the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s going to notice any of this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and it’s going to ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is about all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but in here, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone is going to get hurt if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR
